title: The Beatitudes: The Merciful
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:7

Deuteronomy 4:31

Psalm 123

Micah 6:8

James 2:12-13

Today's passages were read by Ekemini Uwan, a Public Theologian and co-host of Truth’s Table Podcast. Follow her on Twitter @sista_theology and on Instagram @sistatheology.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
